title: Moving Albanian Drug Money, on Trust or in Crypto
description:
Led by brothers Franc and Hajdar Copja, the Copja group stands accused of a bloody string of gangland executions and of trafficking large amounts of cocaine from South America to the European Union between 2018 and 2022.

According to the case file, the proceeds of drug trafficking were stashed away...

title: World Bank lifts Albania's 2025 GDP growth f'cast to 3.7%
Central Banker Report Cards 2025: Central and Eastern Europe
description:
Policymakers brace for 2026 inflation pressures, but central banks remain split on remedies. Global Finance reveals the 2025 Central Banker Report Cards in Central and Eastern Europe.
